name: String with no duplicate chars
description:
Test namelist [with names=[{'name': 'Bart'}, {'name': 'Lisa'}, {'name': 'Maggie'}], expected='Bart, Lisa & Maggie', message='Must work with many names'].

        Given:
        an array containing hashes of names

        Return:
        a string formatted as a list of names separated by commas
        except for the last two names, which should be separated
        by an ampersand.

        :return:
descriptionHtml:
Codewars badge:

Test Description:

Should a string formatted as a list of names separated by commas except for the last two names, which should be separated by an ampersand.

steps.name: Process input consist of names: [{'name': 'Bart'}, {'name': 'Lisa'}, {'name': 'Maggie'}] and verify the output: Bart, Lisa & Maggie.

labels.name: story
labels.value: Format a string of names like 'Bart, Lisa & Maggie'.
